summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Eurocode 2 Slab Design application. Backend fully functional with all calculation engines working correctly. Frontend has strong UI/UX but authentication session persistence needs attention.

resolved_issues.issue: PDF generation failing with ReportLab stylesheet error
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Fixed duplicate style definitions in PDF generator

resolved_issues.issue: One-way slab calculation requiring unnecessary span_y parameter
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Made span_y optional in SlabInput model and updated calculation functions

integration_issues.issue: Users redirected to login when accessing protected routes directly (e.g., /design/new)
integration_issues.description: JWT token may not be properly persisting or being validated on route changes

passed_tests: Landing page loads with complete hero section and features
User registration flow with form validation
Dashboard navigation and empty state display
New design page loads with tabbed interface
Slab type selection (one-way, two-way, flat slab)
Design form input fields and validation
All backend API endpoints (13/13 tests passed)
Eurocode 2 calculation engines for all slab types
PDF generation with detailed EC2 calculations
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate and fix authentication session persistence issue in React AuthProvider. The JWT token storage/retrieval or protected route validation may need adjustment to maintain user sessions across page navigations.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core UI functional, auth session issue present)
